 need some brainstorming

So I'm working on this fic, and I need some more ideas. The basic premise is that the *real* SG-1 are sitting around talking about how their adventures would make a good tv show. They mention what would have to be different in order to draw in ratings. For example, Teal'c points out that Daniel's foul language would have to be cut out. They also notice that the aliens they encounter would have to speak English. I'm starting to run out of thoughts, and hoped the fantastic gang here would have some to share. Take a look at what I've already got (it's short enough to read in three minutes): http://sg1.angelq.net/AU.htm

Post suggestions here or send to sg1@angelq.net

Many, many thanks in advance! Of course, any suggestions I use will be given credit in the author notes. Sorry I'm not really a major author and you won't be famous or anything, but it's all I can offer. :-)

Sam would throw out idea that the leader could be portrayed as something of a Neanderthal when it comes to science stuff. Jack, the college-degree holder, qualified colonel, and experienced field leader that he really is, strenuously objects "Nobody's gonna believe a lunkhead who can't do anything technical in nature would be leading an offworld exploratory team!"
